hReview-aggregate 1 - Single occurrence test

This page was designed to test that values of a hReview-aggregate which are meant to have only a single occurrence are parsed correctly.

Inspired by: Glenn Jones' Microformat Test Suite

Author: Lawrence Woodman (vLife Systems)

Tests

Test Result Comment
hreviewaggregate[0].summary IsEqualTo("Crepes on Cole is awesome") summary is a singular value
hreviewaggregate[0].rating IsEqualTo("5") rating is a singular value
hreviewaggregate[0].count IsEqualTo("3") count is a singular value
hreviewaggregate[0].votes IsEqualTo("6") votes is a singular value
hreviewaggregate[0].item HasProperty(true) item is a singular value

History

  • Created: 11 September 2011 by Lawrence Woodman
